description:
👉🏽Corona Virus Hoax  The Mask For Totalitarian 5G Genocide!
👉🏽Worldwide panic over the Corona Virus continues to grow exponentially, along with the draconian measures legislated to contain it!
There is evidence that Corona is both a hoax and a mask for totalitarian 5G genocide.

I know some people in one of the UK cities where the 5G network went live in late December 2019, since when virtually everybody I know who lives and works within the range of the local mast, has been complaining about the heavy flu-like symptoms and lost of smelling and tasting ability. That’s because of microwave radiation poisoning, which they are finding very difficult to shake off.

Since this occurred several weeks before the first reported case of Corona Virus in Britain, it simply cannot be claimed that these people contracted it.

However, it certainly can be said that they are displaying all the symptoms of being slowly cooked by non-ionising microwave radiation, according to all the very latest peer-reviewed scientific research.
Thank you 🙏🏾 @thebernician
